it is a tale of a mighty demon sealed away beneath the 'onmyo agency'.

where it came from or why it appeared remains a mystery to this day.

white face, golden fur…a nine-tailed fox.

everything was its prey: plants, animals, humans, even fellow spirits.

the world was saved from the brink of destruction by the divinerseimei abe.

the 'onmyo agency' was erected on top of the barrier, where thegenerations of abe family maintained the seal through the power intheir blood.
but even though the creature sleeps, it still plants seeds of evil inhuman minds.
as you might have guessed, only the ones with abe blood in their veinscan fight the corruption.
